text: Federal Focus, Inc was a public relations and lobbying company established about 1986 by Thorne G. Auchter (ex-head of the U.S. OSHA) and Jim Tozzi who had run the Office of Information and Regulatory Affairs (later to become the Office of Management and Budget during the first term of the Reagan Administration. Category:Public relations companies of the United States Category:American companies established in 1986
title: Federal Focus
